name: Crisp (Free Plan)
description: A freemium live chat platform offering a forever-free plan for basic website messaging and inbox management.

name: Tidio (Free Plan)
description: A live chat and chatbot tool with a permanent free tier for small websites and startups.

name: Chatwoot
description: An open-source customer messaging platform you can self-host with full control over your data.

name: Rocket.Chat
description: An open-source communication platform that can be used as a live chat system for websites and apps.

name: Zammad
description: An open-source helpdesk and chat solution for customer support teams.

name: LiveHelperChat
description: A self-hosted open-source live chat application for websites and support teams.

name: Papercups
description: An open-source live chat tool that you can host yourself with real-time messaging features.

name: Mibew
description: A simple open-source web chat system for providing live support to website visitors.

name: JivoChat (Free Plan)
description: A free live chat widget that helps you connect with customers across web and messaging channels.

name: Smartsupp (Free Plan)
description: A live chat and visitor monitoring tool with a forever-free plan for basic customer communication.

name: Pure Chat (Free Plan)
description: A simple live chat solution offering a limited but free plan for small businesses.

name: Zoho SalesIQ (Free Plan)
description: A live chat and visitor tracking tool with a free tier for small teams.

name: Userlike (Free Plan)
description: A live chat platform with a permanent free plan for single operators.

name: HelpCrunch (Free Plan)
description: A customer communication tool with a free tier that includes live chat and basic messaging features.
